Item.Risk_Statement: The lack of adequate plans and operational controls to support power contingency mechanisms may lead to potential disruptions of equipment supporting critical business operations.
Item.Description: The organization provides a short-term uninterruptible power supply to facilitate [Selection (one or more): an orderly shutdown of the information system; transition of the information system to long-term alternate power] in the event of a primary power source loss.
Item.Example: An uninterruptible power supply is available to the information system infrastructure.
Item.Testing_Procedures: Obtain physical and environmental protection policy; procedures addressing emergency power; uninterruptible power supply documentation; other relevant documents or records and ascertain if  the organization provides a short-term uninterruptible power supply to facilitate an orderly shutdown of the information system in the event of a primary power source loss.
